isis.stitle: Body Builder Electrical Data Book - SINGLE REDUCTION AXLES: SPICER S100-S, S105-S, S135-S, S150-S - CLEAN AND INSPECT - INSPECT

svcproc.title: INSPECT
svcproc.para: Prior to reassembly, inspect parts for signs of excessive wear or damage. Replacement of these parts can prevent premature failure and costly downtime.
Bearing surfaces should be inspected for pitting, excessive wear, or overheating ( Figure 15).

figure.caption: Figure 15. Inspect Bearing Surfaces for Pitting, Excessive Wear, or Overheating

svcproc.para: Inspect thrust washers for scoring and cracking ( Figure 16).

figure.caption: Figure 16. Inspect Thrust Washers for Scoring and Cracking

svcproc.para: Inspect gears for wear or damage. Replace gears that are pitted, scored, broken or worn ( Figure 17).

figure.caption: Figure 17. Inspect Gears for Wear or Damage

svcproc.para: Inspect shafts for nicks or scores ( Figure 18).

figure.caption: Figure 18. Inspect Shafts for Nicks or Scores

svcproc.para: Inspect all splines for wear, distortion from twisting, and cracking ( Figure 19).

figure.caption: Figure 19. Inspect Splines for Wear and Distortion

svcproc.para: Inspect housing for stripped or damaged threads and bending fatigue ( Figure 20).

figure.caption: Figure 20. Inspect Housing for Stripped or Damaged Threads and Bending Fatigue
